info.title: Bimeta API
info.description: The BIMeta API provides the meta data of BIMeta fpr developers. With the help of the API, developers can easily integrate this metadata into their own applications. The content of BIMeta is owned and licensed by the publishing organizations.

servers.description: Stage DEV(only for developers!), Raw development, can be down!
Stage TEST (only for developers!), Integrationstests here, can be down
Stage Production with the real data; only here the is data reliable

get.summary: Retrieve the audit history of a property by its Id
get.description: Every change in BIMeta is logged in the audit history according to EN ISO 23386 to ensure the tracebility of the property meta data

post.summary: Request an access token for a user and his rules to view/edit  ressources of the API
post.description: Requesting a token for a user depends on his username/password.

get.summary: Get one single class by its Id
get.description: Every class one Id, which is an unique identifier (UUID). Retrieve the class by this unique identifier.

get.summary: Get all root (top) classes of a classification system by the Id of the classifiaction system (csId)
get.description: Every classification systems can have many classes, that are grouped into versions. This resource retrieves all root classes, regardless of the version, they belong to.

200.description: The data of the classes is available.

get.summary: Get all root (top) classes of a classification system by the Id of the classifiaction system (csId)
get.description: Every classification systems can have many ready to publish classes, that are grouped into versions. This resource retrieves all root ready to publish classes, regardless of the version, they belong to.

200.description: The data of the ready to publish classes is available.

get.summary: Get all  classes of a classification system by the Id of the classifiaction system (csId) and the version (vId}
get.description: Every classification systems can have many classes, that are grouped into  versions. This resource retrieves all root classes, filterd by the  version date so it gets all versions less than or equal current version.

200.description: The data of the classes is available.

get.summary: Get all root (top) classes of a classification system by the Id of the classifiaction system (csId) and the domain version (vId}
get.description: Every classification systems can have many classes, that are grouped into domain versions. This resource retrieves all root classes, filterd by the domain version, they belong to.

200.description: The data of the classes is available.

get.summary: Get all sub classes of a class (id)
get.description: Classes, that are not root classes are alwaye tight to their parent class. This ressource retrieved all sub classes for a given class. If the given class has no sub classes, the ressource will deliver null.

get.summary: Get all sub classes of a class (id), that belong to a specified domain version (vId)
get.description: Classes, that are not root classes are alwaye tight to their parent class (Id) that belong to the given domain version (vId). This ressource retrieved all sub classes for a given class. If the given class has no sub classes, the ressource will deliver null.

get.summary: Get all classes that belong to a specified  classifiaction system version (versionId)
get.description: Classes that belong to the given classifiaction system version (csvId). This ressource retrieved all classes for a given version.

get.summary: Get all classes2Properties that belong to a specified  classifiaction system version (versionId)
get.description: classestoproperties that belong to the given classifiaction system version (csvId). This ressource retrieved all classestoproperties for a given version.

get.summary: Get all classes2Properties that belong to a specified  classifiaction system version (versionId)
get.description: classestoproperties that belong to the given classifiaction system version (csvId). This ressource retrieved all classestoproperties for a given version.

post.summary: Insert or update a class definition (Upsert)
post.description: This ressource receives a class object. If the class already exists, the class is updated, otherwise the (new) class is inserted into BIMeta.

post.summary: update workflow status and versions for a list of classes
post.description: update workflow status and versions for a list of classes.

post.summary: Insert or update a relation of a proptery to a class (Upsert)
post.description: This ressource receives an object with a relation of a property to a class. If the relation already exists, the relation is updated, otherwise the (new) relation is inserted into BIMeta.

200.description: The property is assigned to the class.

get.summary: Get all property definitions, that are attached to this class (Id)
get.description: A property definition can be attached to many classes. This ressource retrieves the property definitions, that are attached to the given class (Id).

get.summary: Get all class to property definitions, that are attached to this class (Id)
get.description: A property definition can be attached to many classes. This ressource retrieves the class to property definitions, that are attached to the given class (Id).

200.description: The classes to properties data are available.

get.summary: Get all property definitions beloning to a specified domain version(versionId), that are attached to this class (Id)
get.description: A property definition can be attached to many classes. This ressource retrieves the property definitions, that are attached to the given class (Id) in the specified doman version (versionId).

delete.summary: Delete a class by its Id
delete.description: The class is deleted, if the class does exist and it has no references, that prevent the deletion

get.summary: Retrieve all mapping of a class to other classes by it Id
get.description: Every class in BIMeta can have mappings to other classes. The other classes can be in the same domain, or in other domains. All mappings are owned by the classes domain. The mappings have qualified information about the nature of the mapping.

post.summary: Insert or update a mapping of a class (Upsert)
post.description: This ressource receives an object with a mapping of a class. If the mapping already exists, the mapping is updated, otherwise the (new) mapping is inserted into BIMeta.

post.summary: Update the class to properties definitions for the desired class
post.description: This ressource upserts the list of classes to properties definitions. Since classes to properties definitions are there and updated in classes page, updates are introduced into BIMeta.

200.description: The class to properties list is upserted.

post.summary: update workflow status and versions for a list of classestoproperties
post.description: update workflow status and versions for a list of classestoproperties.

get.summary: Get the inherited properties for the desired class
get.description: This ressource gets the inherited properties of the selected class from BIMeta db.

get.summary: Retrieve all classification systems
get.description: Every class and property definition is part of a classification system. The data of all classification systems can be retrieved in this ressource.

200.description: The list of classificationsystems is available.

get.summary: Retrieve the classification system by its Id
get.description: Every class and property definition is part of a classification system. The data of the Properties can be retrieved in this ressource.

get.summary: Get all  properties of a classification system by the Id of the classifiaction system (csId) and the version (vId}
get.description: Every classification systems can have many properties, that are grouped into  versions. This resource retrieves all root properties, filterd by the  version date so it gets all versions less than or equal current version.

200.description: The data of the Properties is available.

get.summary: Retrieve the enumerations by CS Id
get.description: Retrieve the enumeration  by CS Id.

get.summary: Retrieve all versions of a classification system by its id

200.description: The list of versions of a classificationsystem is availabe.

get.summary: Get one single classification system version by its Id (vId)

200.description: The cs version data is available.

post.description: This ressource receives a ClassificationSystemVersion object. If the ClassificationSystemVersion already exists, the ClassificationSystemVersion is updated, otherwise the (new) ClassificationSystemVersion is inserted into BIMeta.

post.summary: Inserting default version for all classification systems/classes/properties/c2ps
post.description: Inserting a default version for all existed classes, properties and classificationsystems that exisited before february 2022, IT CAN TAKE MORE THAN 5 MINUTES.

delete.summary: Delete a ClassificationSystemVersion by its Id
delete.description: The ClassificationSystemVersion is deleted, if the ClassificationSystemVersion does exist and it has no references, that prevent the deletion

get.summary: Retrieve all available domains
get.description: Any domain can provide the classes and properties. All versions can be retrieved here.

get.summary: Retrieve a domain by its Id
get.description: Any domain can provide the classes and properties.

get.summary: Get one single domain version by its Id (vId)
get.description: Any domain can provide the classes and properties in different versions, e.g. 'CAFM-Connect 2014', 'CAFM-Connect 2016' and so forth. Retrieve the domain version by this unique identifier (id).

200.description: The domain version data is available.

get.summary: Retrieve all available versions of all domains
get.description: Any domain can provide the classes and properties in different versions, e.g. 'CAFM-Connect 2014', 'CAFM-Connect 2016' and so forth. The defined versions can be retrieved here.

get.summary: Retrieve the list of BIM profiles
get.description: A BIM profile is a digital representation of an information exchange requirement. BIM profiles are related to use cases. Every profile contains severall class definitions and property definitions, that are needed to process the use case in a digital manner. A BIM profile can me made up out of every class and property definition, that are maintained within BIMeta, regardless to which domain they belong to. This ressource delivers a list of all BIM profiles, that are maintained in BIMeta.

200.description: The list of BIM profiles is available.

get.summary: Get propery definition by its Id
get.description: Every property definition contains a lot of meta data according to EN ISO 23386, that defines the usage of the property. In this ressource, the definition of a property can be retrieved by its Id (Guid).

get.summary: Get all properties that belong to a specified  classifiaction system version (versionId)
get.description: properties that belong to the given classifiaction system version (csvId). This ressource retrieved all properties for a given version.

get.summary: Get all properties that belong to a specified  classifiaction system version (versionId)
get.description: properties that belong to the given classifiaction system version (csvId). This ressource retrieved all properties for a given version.

post.summary: Insert or update a property definition (Upsert)
post.description: This ressource receives an object with a property definition. If the property definition already exists, the property definition is updated, otherwise the (new) property definition is inserted into BIMeta.

post.summary: update workflow status and versions for a list of properties
post.description: update workflow status and versions for a list of properties.

get.summary: Retrieve all mapping of a property to other properties by it Id
get.description: Every property in BIMeta can have mappings to other properties. The other properties can be in the same domain, or in other domains. All mappings are owned by the domain of the property. The mappings have qualified information about the nature of the mapping.

post.summary: Insert or update a mapping of a property (Upsert)
post.description: This ressource receives an object with a mapping of a property. If the mapping already exists, the mapping is updated, otherwise the (new) mapping is inserted into BIMeta.

get.summary: Retrieve the enumerations by property Id
get.description: Retrieve the enumeration  by property Id.

get.summary: Get propertyEnumeration definition by its Id
get.description: the definition of a propertyEnumerationcan be retrieved by its Id (Guid).

post.description: This ressource receives an object with a propertyEnumeration. If the propertyEnumeration already exists, the propertyEnumeration is updated, otherwise the (new) propertyEnumeration is inserted into BIMeta.

get.summary: Retrieve the enumeration values by enumeration Id
get.description: Retrieve the enumeration values by enumeration Id.

get.summary: Get propertyEnumerationValues definition by its Id
get.description: the definition of a propertyEnumerationValues can be retrieved by its Id (Guid).

post.description: This ressource receives an object with a propertyEnumerationValue. If the propertyEnumerationValue already exists, the propertyEnumerationValue is updated, otherwise the (new) propertyEnumerationValue is inserted into BIMeta.

get.summary: Retrieve all available measure types and their units as a structure
get.description: Every property definition has a measures type, that defines the data, that ca be story in the property. BIMeta uses at minimum the measure types, defined by EN ISO 16739. Every measure type can have many unit types. The unit types follwow the prEN 16749-1. Those measure types and unit type, that are not included in the named standard, are added directly in BIMeta.

get.summary: put summary here
get.description: put description here

get.summary: put summary here
get.description: put description here

get.summary: Retrieve domains of the publisher.
get.description: Domains of the publisher.

get.summary: Retrieve all available types of mappings
get.description: Every class and every property in BIMeta can be mapped to other classes and properties. Every mapping is qualified by a mapping type. The available mapping types can be retrieved in this ressource.

200.description: The types of mappings are available.

get.summary: Retrieve all available measure types and their units as a list
get.description: Every property definition has a measures type, that defines the data, that ca be story in the property. BIMeta uses at minimum the measure types, defined by EN ISO 16739. Every measure type can have many unit types. The unit types follwow the prEN 16749-1. Those measure types and unit type, that are not included in the named standard, are added directly in BIMeta.

get.summary: Retrieve the list of users, that are registered in BIMeta.
get.description: Every change in BIMeta is tracked, according to EN ISO 23386. Therefore any change in BIMeta is done by an explicit, know person, that represents one or many organizations. This ressource retrievs a list of those users.

get.summary: Retrieve the user, that is registered in BIMeta.
get.description: Every change in BIMeta is tracked, according to EN ISO 23386. Therefore any change in BIMeta is done by an explicit, know person, that represents one or many organizations. This ressource retrievs a list of those users.

post.summary: Insert or update a user definition (Upsert)
post.description: This ressource receives a user object. If the user already exists, the user is updated, otherwise the (new) user is inserted into BIMeta.

get.summary: Retrieve all versions statuses

200.description: The list of version status is availabe.

get.summary: Get one single version status by its Id (vsId)

200.description: The version status data is available.

post.description: This ressource receives a VersionStatus object. If the VersionStatus already exists, the VersionStatus is updated, otherwise the (new) VersionStatus is inserted into BIMeta.

get.summary: Retrievs the workflow status and the workflow itself.
get.description: Every change in BIMeta is processed by a prdefined workflow according to EN ISO 23386 to ensure the tracebility of the meta data. This ressource provides the list of the available workflow status and the workflow definition.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
